pkgmetadata.longdescription: Projected Spatial Gaussian Process Methods // Implements projected sparse Gaussian process Kriging (Ingram 'et. al.', 2008, doi:10.1007/s00477-007-0163-9) as an additional method for the 'intamap' package. More details on implementation in Barillec 'et. al.', 2010, doi:10.1016/j.cageo.2010.05.008.
